name: WorldWinner: Play for Cash
description:
Compete to win REAL MONEY. We've prized out MILLIONS every month in online tournaments! Entry fees start as low as 88¢. Simply make a deposit and get in the game! Free warm-up tournaments, too.

All your favorite games:
-- Angry Birds Champions
-- Wheel of Fortune®
-- Two Dots
-- Solitaire Rush
-- SCRABBLE Cubes
-- Pop & Plunder
-- SwapIt 2
-- TRIVIAL PURSUIT
-- Solitaire TriPeaks
-- Catch 21®
-- The Price is Right®: Super Plinko™
...and more on the way!

*Officially licensed versions of the games you love, built for skill-based competitive mobile play.

*Compete against opponents of similar skill. Each player gets the same game board, turns, and time limits.

*Secure deposits & withdrawals. Easily withdraw winnings anytime you’d like!

Recommended devices: iPhone 5 or higher, iPad 3/iPad mini 2 or higher, iPod touch 6 or higher.

Follow us for tips, trailers, and more:
facebook.com/worldwinner
Twitter: @WorldWinner
YouTube: http://bit.ly/2sUUZj8

Note: Skill-based, real-money competitions are not available in all locations.
Questions? Visit https://gsnweb.zendesk.com/hc/en-us

By downloading the App, you unconditionally consent and agree to the following:
Terms of Service: http://gsngamesnetwork.com/terms.html

Privacy Policy: http://gsngamesnetwork.com/privacy.html
